Package ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.util

Class IridaFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.util.IridaFiles
  • public final class IridaFiles
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class which has file object operations that require access to the iridaFileStorageUtility but in a static context
